subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Coach Mike Babcock picked Petr Mrazek to start over Jimmy Howard, the Red Wings’ No. 1 goalie since 2009, for a playoff opener against Tampa Bay.
snippet: Coach Mike Babcock picked Petr Mrazek to start over Jimmy Howard, the Red Wings’ No. 1 goalie since 2009, for a playoff opener against Tampa Bay.
